segment.source: How you can work on your device and keep your company safe_deleted
segment.target: How you can work on your device and keep your company safe_deleted

segment.source: How you can work on your device and keep your company safe_deleted
segment.target: How you can work on your device and keep your company safe_deleted

segment.source: You are an important part of keeping our corporate data and resources protected.
segment.target: You are an important part of keeping our corporate data and resources protected.

segment.source: Here’s how you can help: enroll your phone or tablet into Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Here’s how you can help: enroll your phone or tablet into Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Once you enroll, you will be able to continue using your mobile phone or tablet to get your work done, and IT will be able to manage limited aspects of your mobile device to keep us protected.
segment.target: Once you enroll, you will be able to continue using your mobile phone or tablet to get your work done, and IT will be able to manage limited aspects of your mobile device to keep us protected.

segment.source: You will not lose access to personal apps and data or need to manually configure company network or email connections.
segment.target: You will not lose access to personal apps and data or need to manually configure company network or email connections.

segment.source: All your private stuff is still for your eyes only.
segment.target: All your private stuff is still for your eyes only.

segment.source: Use your phone or tablet for work, and keep company information safe
segment.target: Use your phone or tablet for work, and keep company information safe

segment.source: Things you can do after you enroll
segment.target: Things you can do after you enroll

segment.source: Access email and other work files
segment.target: Access email and other work files

segment.source: Reset your phone to factory settings if it is lost or stolen
segment.target: Reset your phone to factory settings if it is lost or stolen

segment.source: Automatically configure your company email account
segment.target: Automatically configure your company email account

segment.source: Get company apps from the Company Portal
segment.target: Get company apps from the Company Portal

segment.source: Security steps IT can take after you enroll
segment.target: Security steps IT can take after you enroll

segment.source: Reset your phone to factory settings if it is lost or stolen
segment.target: Reset your phone to factory settings if it is lost or stolen

segment.source: Remove company-related files and apps (without removing your personal files or apps)
segment.target: Remove company-related files and apps (without removing your personal files or apps)

segment.source: Require you to use a password or PIN
segment.target: Require you to use a password or PIN

segment.source: Remotely reset the PIN or lock your phone or tablet if it is lost or stolen
segment.target: Remotely reset the PIN or lock your phone or tablet if it is lost or stolen

segment.source: Make your phone or tablet compatible with our security standards, which helps you as well as the company
segment.target: Make your phone or tablet compatible with our security standards, which helps you as well as the company

segment.source: What you need to do now
segment.target: What you need to do now

segment.source: Sign in to work > swipe to the
segment.target: Sign in to work > swipe to the

segment.source: page > Tap to enroll this device
segment.target: page > Tap to enroll this device

segment.source: The Android and iOS warnings you see simply verify that you want to enroll your device.
segment.target: The Android and iOS warnings you see simply verify that you want to enroll your device.

segment.source: IT will use the Company Portal to supply you with many of the apps you need to do your work from your phone or tablet.
segment.target: IT will use the Company Portal to supply you with many of the apps you need to do your work from your phone or tablet.

segment.source: To install an app from the Company Portal:
segment.target: To install an app from the Company Portal:

segment.source: Don't want your device managed anymore?
segment.target: Don't want your device managed anymore?

segment.source: If you no longer want to use your phone or tablet for work, you will need to unenroll it.
segment.target: If you no longer want to use your phone or tablet for work, you will need to unenroll it.

segment.source: After you do so, you will no longer have access to the company files and apps.
segment.target: After you do so, you will no longer have access to the company files and apps.

segment.source: To unenroll by using the Company Portal:
segment.target: To unenroll by using the Company Portal:

segment.source: If you've lost your phone or tablet
segment.target: If you've lost your phone or tablet

segment.source: If your phone is lost or stolen, you can reset it to factory defaults to remove both your personal and work information from it.
segment.target: If your phone is lost or stolen, you can reset it to factory defaults to remove both your personal and work information from it.

segment.source: You can do this from a browser:
segment.target: You can do this from a browser:

segment.source: in your browser, and sign in to your work account
segment.target: in your browser, and sign in to your work account

segment.source: , click the lost or stolen device
segment.target: , click the lost or stolen device

segment.source: If you are unable to reset your lost or stolen device, contact IT to reset it for you.
segment.target: If you are unable to reset your lost or stolen device, contact IT to reset it for you.
